title: Experience Improvements
headline: Experience Improvements
subtitle: Coming soon to GTA Online
content:
As part of GTA Online: San Andreas Mercenaries weâ€™re continuing to improve the online experience with a number of experiential updates and upgrades, including:

- The ability to claim all destroyed vehicles at once when filing a Mors Mutual Insurance claim.
- Custom description tags for garages.
- Alternative sprint control (hold to sprint) in the Settings Menu.

And much more. Check out the Rockstar Newswire for more details.
